data.title: Vertafore
data.meta_description: NetVU is an independent, volunteer-driven organization made up of Vertafore product users. NetVU serves as a treasure trove of education, advocacy, and peer networking. And membership is FREE as a Vertafore customer.
data.text:
NetVU

The Network of Vertafore Users (NetVU) is an independent, volunteer-driven organization made up of Vertafore product users. NetVU serves as a treasure trove of education, advocacy, and peer networking. And membership is FREE as a Vertafore customer.

As our customer, you have free membership access to join a community of users unlike any other. The Network of Vertafore Users (NetVU) is a volunteer-driven organization focused on connecting our customers with their peers. But NetVU is more than just an ordinary user group. It offers both product-specific and industry-related education and networking opportunities to connect with and learn from other Vertafore users. They advocate for you, not only with us but also within the larger insurance industry. The possibilities to get involved are endless!

Join the community at netvu.org
